title: Katie Price shares snap of daughter Princess despite not being with her over half term
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Katie Price's has shared a horse riding snap of her daughter Princess but her Instagram story showed her visiting her beau Kris' sister's new baby.

The former glamour model uploaded a picture of her daughter horse riding onto Instagram on Wednesday evening but it appears to be a throwback snap as it did not match the time stamped footage on her account stories.

Keeping things vague, the 41-year-old captioned the offering on her grid with a princess emoji followed by a horse.

The sweet snap showed Princess, 12, sat on a white horse kitted out with a hat as she pulled on the reigns.

Meanwhile, her story showed her filming her five-year-old daughter Bunny - who she shares with ex Kieran Hayler- cuddling a newborn baby on a white sofa.

Katie wrote on the adorable image: "Bunny loves babies."

She also shared the same photo on her grid.

It comes after she recently left fans baffled after appearing to claim she's spent the day with at least two of her five children... despite youngest son Jett appearing on his dad's Instagram .

The mum of five shared a snap of six-year-old Jett standing in a garden alongside her 17-year-old son Harvey, captioning it: "Love Sunday mornings with my boys."

In the picture, both brothers seem to be at Katie's on/off boyfriend Kris Boyson's house, as it has the same wooden shed he built in his garden earlier this year.

(Image: Instagram)

But while Katie was insinuating she had Jett with her, his dad Kieran shared live footage of the boy on his own Instagram Story running around a family attraction.

Jett joined his little sister Bunny and some kid pals for a day out at Tulleys Farm in West Sussex, which is hosting its annual Shocktober Fest this month.

(Image: DIGITAL/EROTEME.CO.UK)

Both kids were dressed up in Halloween costumes as they tore around the venue, posing with characters and lobbing apples in a slingshot game.

Fans of Katie were confused as to how Jett managed to be with both his separated parents at the same time.

One told Katie: "Have you seen kierans live stream on IG, pulling you out about claiming you had kids."

Another said sarcastically: "Those kids are remarkable; two places at once."

And a third dubbed her "desperate to get people to believe she's playing mum this weekend".

Just the night before, Katie shared a snap of Jett and Bunny eating dinner with their older brother Junior on a garden bench.

(Image: Instagram)

"Jett loves finding things to show us all our little explorer," she captioned the family shot.

However, the children didn't appear to be dressed for the chilly autumnal weather, prompting speculation Katie had used an old picture of her kids.

And Kieran backed up that theory when he filmed Bunny waking up at his house this morning.

Meanwhile, Junior and Princess - her children from her first marriage to Peter Andre - have been spending half term at their dad's.

(Image: Instagram)

Junior is said to be so embarrassed by the state of Katie's mucky mansion - currently undergoing a renovation project - that he's refusing to stay with his mum.

A source told Mirror Online: "He was so embarrassed by the mess and preferred Peter's cleaner house. He is like any teenage boy and embarrasses easily so he just didn't visit the house.

"He still saw his mum but wouldn't stay overnight because he just couldn't stand the mess.

"Junior also needed to get to school and Katie not driving meant it was more difficult to get around."

Mirror Online have contacted Katie's representative for comment.
description: The mother-of-five's Instagram gallery showss a sweet snap of her daughter Princess even though they are not together over the school holidays
